fr.reflexe.viewshell.api

Annotation Type PluginService


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface PluginService
    Identifies OSGi service interfaces that are generally implemented by plugins for ViewShell applications and made available at runtime.

    Interfaces marked with this annotation may be added or removed dynamically, and can be automatically detected by system components. The ViewShell application host provides some default implementations for some of these plugin services. At any time, for any of these interfaces, there may be zero, one, or more implementations available (remember, they can also be added or removed at any time without stopping the application).

    Normally, the @PluginService annotation is only applied to interfaces within fr.reflexe.viewshell.api (and subpackages). It is not intended for direct usage in other packages or in implementing classes.

    Note: This annotation is not used as part of the runtime service lookup behavior in OSGi, it is primarily designed as an aid to help implement new components to use within ViewShell. It may be used to automate the creation of plugins by identifying services that you may implement.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
